get.description: EdgeSet sends push events over a Server-Sent Events (SSE) stream. While designed for the browser, these events can also be read programmatically.

put.description: This changes the currently logged in user's (your) password.

delete.description: This is an EdgeSet extension to the Trino/Presto API.

put.summary: set week start day (1 = Monday, 7 = Sunday)

get.description: Note that secrets (passwords, credentials, etc.) will not be included for security reasons.

patch.description: Data sources can be enabled/disabled by setting the `enabled` key.

400.description: Invalid `X-Presto-Prepared-Statement` or `X-Trino-Prepared-Statement` or `X-Presto-Schema` or `X-Trino-Schema` or `X-Presto-Catalog` or `X-Trino-Catalog` or `Forwarded` or `body`
